original_text: When they came to the shore, they saw that someone had lit a fire. Some fish were cooking on it. There was some bread there, too.
korean_text: 육지에 올라보니 숯불이 있는데 그 위에 생선이 놓였고 떡도 있더라

sentences.original_text: When they came to the shore
they saw that someone had lit a fire
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누군가 불을 피웠다는 것을 보았다

sentences.original_text: Some fish were cooking on it
sentences.korean_translation: 그 위에서 생선 몇 마리가 요리되고 있었다

sentences.original_text: There was some bread there, too
